title: Magikill

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Summon a wall of electricity.
- Throw forth a toxic spray.
- Cause a fiery explosion.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The electric wall will prevent your target from visiting.
- The toxic spray will poison your target. This is Astral.
- The explosion will deal a Basic attack to your target and their visitors.
- Your abilities have a three night cooldown.
- With the Necronomicon, you have no cooldowns.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"The Magikill caused them to combust." (Explosion)
"They were poisoned by a Magikill." (Poison)
"A wall of electricity took you by surprise, shocking when you tried to enter!" (Electric wall)

desc:
Post 288
*You do not walk among the Townspeople because they do not understand you. Your discoveries did not hurt you.*
